PackSource.Name: Summon Pack Sources
PackSource.Hint: Comma-separated list of package names containing summon actors (e.g., 'summons-for-pf1e')

DestinationFolder.Name: Destination Folder
DestinationFolder.Hint: Folder name where summoned actors will be stored

UseUserLinkedActorOnly.Name: Use User Linked Actor Only
UseUserLinkedActorOnly.Hint: If enabled, non-GM users can only summon using their assigned character

EnableAugmentSummoning.Name: Enable Augment Summoning
EnableAugmentSummoning.Hint: Show Augment Summoning checkbox in the summon dialog

EnableExtendMetamagic.Name: Enable Extend Metamagic
EnableExtendMetamagic.Hint: Show Extend Metamagic checkbox in the summon dialog

EnableReachMetamagic.Name: Enable Reach Metamagic
EnableReachMetamagic.Hint: Show Reach Metamagic checkbox in the summon dialog

EnableConjuredArmor.Name: Enable Conjured Armor
EnableConjuredArmor.Hint: Show Conjured Armor checkbox for psychic casters

EnableHarrowedSummoning.Name: Enable Harrowed Summoning
EnableHarrowedSummoning.Hint: Show Harrowed Summoning options in the summon dialog
